thread.title: 10 instagram worthy shots to take this christmas in EuropeTravelandtourworld.com

author: travelandtourworld.com
title: 10 instagram worthy shots to take this christmas in EuropeTravelandtourworld.com
text:
10 instagram worthy shots to take this christmas in Europe Published on : Friday, August 28, 2015
An European Christmas is unlike any other celebration in the entire world. The Christmas Markets dating back to the middles ages, the soft fluttering of snow upon fairy tale like homes, the scent of freshly baked Stollen in the air but most of all, some of the most beautiful photographs you will ever capture.Here are the 10 most Instagram worthy shots to have this Christmas, as shared to you by Insight Vacations.
The Christmas Markets of Frankfurt
One of the oldest Christmas Markets in Germany, expect to see building upon building illuminated with sparkling fairy lights. Visit this market with Insight’s Winter Wonderland.
Chillon Castle in Switzerland
This island castle located on the shores of Lake Geneva offer a spectacular sight reminiscent of medieval times, and the oldest part of the castle was reportedly built in 1005. See the castle on Insight’s Magical Switzerland.
The Main Square of Prague from the Clock Tower
Walk up to the astronomical clock in Prague and capture this stunning sight from above. Take in the history of Prague with Insight’s Vienna, Budapest and Prague.
The Chapel Bridge in Lucerne
Built in 1333, the Chapel Bridge of Lucerne runs in a unique diagonal angle across the Reuss River and features artwork dated back to the 17th century. Capture this image on Insight’s Journey from Rome.Piazza Navona in Rome
It is noted to be one of the most beautiful squares in all of Rome and was featured in the Dan Brown movie ‘Angels & Demons’. Visit its sculptures on Insight’s Easy Pace Italy.
The City of Salzburg in winter
The city of Salzburg is internationally renowned for its Baroque architecture and the scenes from the ‘Sound of Music’. This winter wonderland panorama is not to be missed. Enjoy this view on Insight’s Christmas Markets of Austria and Bavaria.
Source:- Insight Vacation
